==Audience==
==Audience==
â
Neowin focuses its attention on advanced computer users and technology enthusiasts of all kinds, although it is comprised mainly of users of the [[Microsoft Windows]] [[operating system]]. It is worth noting, however, that it has active users of Linux- and Unix-based operating systems, including [[Mac OS X]]. Neowin also has its own operating system, based on [[Ubuntu (Linux distribution)|Ubuntu]], currently being actively developed under the name of Shift Linux.
+
Neowin focuses its attention on advanced computer users and technology enthusiasts of all kinds, although it is comprised mainly of users of the [[Microsoft Windows]] [[operating system]]. It is worth noting, however, that it has active users of Linux- and Unix-based operating systems, including [[Mac OS X]]. Neowin also has its own operating system, based on [[Ubuntu (operating system)|Ubuntu]], currently being actively developed under the name of Shift Linux.
===Moderation===
===Moderation===
